history.proof: intros a b p H1 H2. induction p. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - scongruence unfold: olist, eqT, fP, pX.

ctx: intros a b p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) eqT_refl := Term.eqT_refl A n : reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n)) consA := cons : mon n -> list (mon n) -> list (mon n) nilA := nil : list (mon n) listA := list (mon n) : Set DescA := Desc (mon n) ltM : list (mon n) -> Prop a, b : Term A n H1 : olist (pX a nil) H2 : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b Unable to unify "eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b" with "olist (pX b nil)".

ctx: intros a b p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "olist (pX a p) -> olist (pX b p)" on hypothesis of type "eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b".

ctx: intros a b p H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (olist_cons p0 a a0 H1 H2).
exceptions.exn: The reference p0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a b p H1 H2. induction p. - apply H2. - apply IHp in H2. apply (olist_cons p0 a a0 H1 H2).
